item.title: How to change the language of dates in R
item.author: pmassicotte@hotmail.com (Philippe Massicotte)
item.description: Recently, I had to make a ggplot2 graphic with data that contained dates. Letâ€™s create some sample data with dates. n <- 10 df <- tibble( x = seq(as.Date("2020-01-01"), as.Date("2020-10-10"), length.out = n), y = rnorm(n) ) df #> # A tibble: 10 x 2 #> x y #> <date> <dbl> #> 1 2020-01-01 0.738 #> 2 2020-02-01 -0.394 #> 3 2020-03-03 -0.146 #> 4 2020-04-04 -2.20 #> 5 2020-05-05 -0.
